article_title: CDC: Hospitals in Manatee, Sarasota meet standards for fighting acquired infections
article_text: The five hospitals in Manatee and Sarasota counties met national standards for combating most infections acquired by patients in hospitals, according to data collected by the federal government as part of a national effort to reduce such infections.
